item.title: Venice-Bound Algerian Horror Film ‘Roqia’ Acquired by Alpha Violet (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: French sales outfit Alpha Violet has acquired the rights for Algerian horror film “Roqia,” written and directed by Yanis Koussim, which will have its world premiere at the Venice Film Festival as part
